00040 string valgrindString1 = "valgrind --leak-check=yes --log-file=";
00041 string valgrindString2 = ".valgrind.txt ";

00043 class test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     int numPassed;
00047     int numFailed;
00048     std::string testDir;
00049     std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
00050     std::set<std::string> setIgnore;
00051     std::vector<std::string> vSixFiles;
00052     std::vector<std::string> vOneFile;
00053 
00054     test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick()
00055     {
00056         numPassed = 0;
00057         numFailed = 0;
00058 
00059         // Header paramters to ignore
00060         setIgnore.insert("FileCreationTime");
00061         setIgnore.insert("FileIdentifier");
00062         setIgnore.insert("program-version");
00063         setIgnore.insert("create_date");
00064         setIgnore.insert("create-date");
00065         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-verbose");
00066         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-exec-guid");
00067         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-program-cvs-id");
00068         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-version-to-report");
00069         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-command-line");
00070         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-mem-usage");
00071         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-run-probeset-genotype");
00072         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cels");
00073         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-out-dir");
00074         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-time-start");
00075         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-free-mem-at-start");
00076 
00077         // Data Set columns to ignore (Specify as Group.Set.Column)
00078         setIgnore.insert("MultiData.CopyNumber.SmoothSignal");
00079         setIgnore.insert("Segments.CN.SegmentID");
00080         setIgnore.insert("Segments.LOH.SegmentID");
00081         setIgnore.insert("Segments.CNNeutralLOH.SegmentID");
00082         setIgnore.insert("Segments.NormalDiploid.SegmentID");
00083         setIgnore.insert("Segments.Mosaicism.SegmentID");
00084         setIgnore.insert("Segments.NoCall.SegmentID");
00085 
00086         // File tags to check for equivalency
00087         vSixFiles.push_back("NA06985_GW6_C");
00088         vSixFiles.push_back("NA06993_GW6_C");
00089         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07000_GW6_C");
00090         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07019_GW6_C");
00091         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07029_GW6_C");
00092         vSixFiles.push_back("NA07056_GW6_C");
00093 
00094         vOneFile.push_back("NA07029_GW6_C");
00095     }
00096 
00097     void execute(const std::string& str) {
00098       std::string cmd =Fs::convertCommandToUnc(str);
00099       if (system(cmd.c_str()) != 0) {Err::errAbort("Execution failed for command: " + cmd);}
00100     }
00101 
00102     void equivalency(const std::string& name, std::vector<string>& vFileTags)
00103     {
00104         bool bPassed = true;
00105         AffxString strFileName1;
00106         AffxString strFileName2;
00107         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00108         for(unsigned int i = 0; (i < vFileTags.size()); i++)
00109         {
00110             strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/copy-number/GenomeWideSNP_6/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + ".CN5.CNCHP";
00111             strFileName2 = testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + ".CN5.CNCHP";
00112             if (!Calvin::equivalent(strFileName1, strFileName2, setIgnore, mapEpsilon, 0.0001, 1.0, false)) {bPassed = false;}
00113 
00114         }
00115         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00116         if (bPassed) {numPassed++;} else {numFailed++;}
00117     }
00118 
00119     void run()
00120     {
00121 
00122         copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels();
00123         copynumber_HapMap270_6_cels();
00124         reference_6_cels();
00125         copynumber_1_cels();
00126 
00127     }
00128 
00129 
00130 
00131     void copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels()
00132     {
00133                 string name = "copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels";
00134                 execute( valgrindString1 + name + valgrindString2 + " ./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00135              --verbose 3 \
00136              --run-geno-qc false \
00137              --cychp-output false \
00138              --cnchp-output true \
00139              --text-output true \
00140              --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.hapmap270.na26.1.r2.a5.ref \
00141              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00142              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00143              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00144              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00145              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00146              --o " + testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6/copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels \
00147              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00148              ");
00149 
00150         equivalency("copynumber_HapMap270_1_cels", vOneFile);
00151     }
00152

00181     void reference_6_cels()
00182     {
00183                 string name = "reference_6_cels";
00184         Fs::rm(testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels/CNReference.a5.ref", false);
00185                 execute( valgrindString1 + name + valgrindString2 + " ./apt-copynumber-workflow \
00186              --verbose 3 \
00187              --run-geno-qc false \
00188              --cychp-output false \
00189              --cnchp-output true \
00190              --text-output true \
00191              --reference-output " + testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels/CNReference.a5.ref \
00192              --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.spf \
00193              --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrXprobes \
00194              --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.chrYprobes \
00195              --special-snps ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.specialSNPs \
00196              --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/GenomeWideSNP_6.na27.6.annot.db \
00197              --o " + testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels \
00198              --temp-dir " + testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6/reference_6_cels \
00199              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06985_GW6_C.CEL \
00200              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA06993_GW6_C.CEL \
00201              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07000_GW6_C.CEL \
00202              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07019_GW6_C.CEL \
00203              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07029_GW6_C.CEL \
00204              ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/copynumber-workflow/GenomeWideSNP_6/NA07056_GW6_C.CEL \
00205              ");
00206 
00207         equivalency("reference_6_cels", vSixFiles); // Reference building
00208     }

00233 
00234 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00235 {
00236   try {
00237 
00238     FsTestDir testDir;
00239     testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-workflow-valgrind", true);
00240 
00241     ofstream logOut;
00242     string logName;
00243     logName = testDir.asString() + "/test-regression-copynumber-workflow.log";
00244     valgrindString1 = valgrindString1 + testDir.asString() + "/";
00245     
00246     Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
00247     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00248     LogStream log(3, &logOut);
00249     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00250     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00251     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00252 
00253     Verbose::setLevel(3);
00254     test_regression_copynumber_workflow_quick test;
00255     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00256 
00257     if ( !Fs::dirExists(test.testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6") ) {
00258       Fs::mkdirPath(test.testDir + "/GenomeWideSNP_6", false);
00259     }
00260 
00261     Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-copynumber-workflow");
00262 
00263     test.run();
00264 
00265     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed) + " for test-regression-copynumber-workflow");
00266     logOut.close();
00267     return test.numFailed != 0;
00268   }
00269   catch(...) {
00270       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00271       return 1;
00272   }
00273   return 1;
00274 }
